bibl.title: Imperator Caesar Maximinus and Maximus Caesar.
bibl.note: Discusses a number of documents (including ostraca and papyri) mentioning both Maximinus and his son Maximus. Maximus remained till his death Caesar and never became Imperator.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, Imperator Caesar Maximinus and Maximus Caesar.
Discusses a number of documents (including ostraca and papyri) mentioning both Maximinus and his son Maximus. Maximus remained till his death Caesar and never became Imperator.
